channel.title: +MT on देवेषु विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +MT on देवेषु विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: Ontology
item.description: An ontology of the Japanese understanding of gods, melding native traditions with that of the deva-dharma refracting through the prism of the saugata doctrines. There are what in biology we would call “distant paralogs” – ancient Eurasiatic cognates going back very deep in time. While Susanoo has a very distinct character in the Japanese tradition, he still retains some features of a very ancient ancestor that also gave rise to the Thunderer among the Indo-Europeans.
